name: Pretty Little Fears
description:
Presentation

Travel into dark forest, wet swamp and abandonned park to find 3 of your toys and escape from this malignant world.

The beast, the king of this dark world is looking for you and will prevent you from escaping. Hide, observe and move to complete your quest.

Assets

ALL of the assets in the game are orignals and have been made by our team excepted the ones bellow :

  • Custom shaders (double sided, outline, UI blur, water)
  • Cloud texture and LOD tree billboard texture
  • Skybox and MMI Bordeaux logo textures
  • DrawFont and Biotif fonts
  • Cliffs and tiny rocks meshes (texture are orignals)
  • Musics (Underwater exploration, Gamela, Absention)
  • SFX (zapsplat.com and freefx.co.uk)

Credits

Adel SANAA : Game Designer, Artistic co-director, Lead UX & UI designer, Lead Sound designer, Story-writer.
Gabriel ROULEAU : Lead Programmer, Game Designer, 3D artist.
Gabriel PAGLIA : Game Designer, Artistic co-director , Lead 2D artist, Story-writer.
Kayo SILVA : Game Designer, Lead Level Designer, Environment Designer.
Théo SAMINADIN : Game Designer, Lead 3D Artist, 3D animator, Environment Designer.

For the futur

You can download the original version "JAM VERSION" below but we will continue to update the game. Here is our plan :

1. Add performance quality
2. Add more player feedbacks
3. Add world interactions for the player
4. Complete outro
5. Add more control on game's settings

Warning : you can download orignal jam version below but this version has a lack of some features. We will upload soon a advanced version.
